name: Database view naming convention - prefix control
description:
Names of Views should start with X or by 'ZV' for SAP database views.
This reports shows all the database views not starting with the prefix. 
The prefix value is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all views that does not respect the naming conventions.
It provides the following information:
View full name
rationale: For readability aspects, naming conventions must be respected.
reference:
Enhancing the Quality of ABAP Development, 
Meijs-Krouwels-Heulmans-Sommen, SAP Press
ISBN 1-59229-030-2
remediation: Change name according to the naming convention.
remediationSample: The name should be ZVMATERIAL or ZV_MATERIAL.
sample: The following name does not respect naming conventions for SAP database views: ZMATERIAL
